title: Ashley Roberts reveals her cleavage in a VERY daring check minidress
text:
The night may well have been Cara Delevingne’s, but special guest Ashley Roberts ensured she stood out while attending the supermodel’s latest fashion launch on Tuesday.

The Pussycat Doll, 38, was in attendance as Cara launched her new collaboration with online retailer Nasty Gal at raunchy nightspot The Box, in the heart of London’s Soho.

And her plunging, off-the-shoulder dress guaranteed she claimed her fair share of the spotlight while rubbing shoulders with Cara and her coterie of guests, among them Ashley Benson, Daisy Lowe and London party girl Lottie Moss.

Looking good: Ashley Roberts ensured she stood out while attending Cara Delevingne's latest fashion launch in London on Tuesday evening

Fully exposing her cleavage, the striking check dress served to compliment Ashley’s curves as she made her way inside the late night venue, which traditionally opens its doors at 11pm.

The performer added to her look with a pair of strappy black heels, while a fringed handbag proved to be her only accessory.

With her hair pulled into a loose bun, Ashley drew further attention to her features by opting for deft touches of make-up selected from a soft colour palette.

Stylish: The Pussycat Doll, 38, was in attendance as Cara launched her new collaboration with online retailer Nasty Gal at raunchy nightspot The Box, in the heart of Soho

The American star was without boyfriend Giovanni Pernice, the Italian ballroom professional she met while appearing on the sixteenth series of Strictly Come Dancing.

Ashley, who has also been appearing on the Heart Radio breakfast show, recently told the Daily Mail's YOU magazine that she's in no rush to have children with Giovanni.

She said: 'You see these headlines warning you only have so much time and it puts stuff in your head, so I was worried about all that last year, but then I was, like, "I’m not even going to put that out into the universe; if children are meant to be, they’re meant to be".

Don't mind me: Her plunging, off-the-shoulder dress guaranteed she claimed her fair share of the spotlight at the event

'Now I’m too busy to think about it. Let’s see what next year has in store and take it bit by bit.

'I feel young inside and if things don’t work out timing-wise, there’s adoption, there are other avenues I can take.'

Ashley found fame as a member of the Pussycat Dolls alongside Nicole Scherzinger, Kimberley Wyatt, Carmit Bachar, Jessica Sutta and Melody Thornton.

They dominated the charts in the early 2000s and became part of one of the world's biggest girlbands.

The group scored two UK number one singles - Don't Cha and Stick Wit U - before going their separate ways in 2010.

Finishing touches: The performer added to her look with a pair of strappy black heels, while a fringed handbag proved to be her only accessory
description: The Pussycat Doll, 38, was in attendance as Cara launched her new collaboration with online retailer Nasty Gal at raunchy nightspot The Box, in the heart of London's Soho.
